channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.3 GA – webinar replay + Q&A now available
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: vijay
item.dc:creator: vijay
item.description: can i install mysql cluster 7.3 on mysql 5.6.19 ? how?
item.content:encoded: can i install mysql cluster 7.3 on mysql 5.6.19 ? how?

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-7-3-ga-webinar-replay-qa-now-available#comment-765">Nemanja Dubravac</a>.
The upgrade procedure is to run a rolling restart of the Cluster where you start each node with the new version of the software - see <a href="http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/mysql-cluster-rolling-restart.html" title="Rolling restarts in MySQL Cluster" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/mysql-cluster-rolling-restart.html</a> for details.
If you're using MySQL Cluster Manager then there's an upgrade command you can use... <a href="http://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-cluster-manager/1.2/en/mcm-upgrade-cluster.html" title="MySQL Cluster Manager - upgrade command" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-cluster-manager/1.2/en/mcm-upgrade-cluster.html</a>
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nemanja Dubravac.

The upgrade procedure is to run a rolling restart of the Cluster where you start each node with the new version of the software – see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/mysql-cluster-rolling-restart.html for details.

If you’re using MySQL Cluster Manager then there’s an upgrade command you can use… http://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-cluster-manager/1.2/en/mcm-upgrade-cluster.html

Andrew.

item.title: By: Nemanja Dubravac
item.dc:creator: Nemanja Dubravac
item.description: What's the upgrade procedure from 7.2? I can't find any useful documentation on dev.mysql.com. Thanks
item.content:encoded: What’s the upgrade procedure from 7.2? I can’t find any useful documentation on dev.mysql.com. Thanks
